title: Dynamic Assessment-Based English Speaking Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and sentence structures
context.additional_context: The learners are adults over 40 who require English speaking skills in their job contexts but have beginner-level proficiency and learning anxiety. Learning outcomes are measured through real-time online classes and project-based assessments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can construct English dialogues related to daily tasks with over 80% accuracy using a dynamic assessment-based speech recognition system.
Learners' anxiety in English speaking learning decreases by 30% compared to pre-assessment by the end of the program.
Learners can recognize and correct their pronunciation errors through a feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
